metadata.name: Monero Crypto Coin Mining Pool Lookup
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious DNS queries to Monero mining pools

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('pool.minexmr.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('fr.minexmr.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('de.minexmr.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('sg.minexmr.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('ca.minexmr.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('us-west.minexmr.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('pool.supportxmr.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('mine.c3pool.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr-eu1.nanopool.org')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr-eu2.nanopool.org')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr-us-east1.nanopool.org')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr-us-west1.nanopool.org')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr-asia1.nanopool.org')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr-jp1.nanopool.org')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr-au1.nanopool.org')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr.2miners.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr.hashcity.org')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmr.f2pool.com')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('xmrpool.eu')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('pool.hashvault.pro'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious DNS queries to Monero mining pools

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate crypto coin mining Reference: https://www.nextron-systems.com/2021/10/24/monero-mining-pool-fqdns/
